entry.title: v0.0.8
entry.content:
Resources​

  • Resource nodes appear on certain planets and can be mined for their resources
  • Resources are a premium currency used for crafting and item upgrades
  • Enemies also have a chance to drop resources on death. Any resource can drop in this way
  • Resources can be exchanged for energy cells. Currently a flat rate of 1:10. Will update for resource rarity in later update

Crafting​

  • Weapons can be upgraded using resources discovered throughout the universe
  • Crafting is available at any point during planetary exploration
  • An initial set of weapons have upgrades available. More coming in future update

Bosses​

  • Bosses can now spawn on levels preceding extraction
  • Bosses will introduce new and unique mechanics over time
  • First boss has been added at wave 10 with placeholder behavior and animation

Item Types​

  • Added new item types which modify game behavior beyond stat modifications
  • Initial set includes Ion Cannon, MinerBot, Free rerolls (perk and item), Item Store discounts, and chance for double cell pickup
  • Ion Cannon provides aerial support
  • MinerBot collects resources for the player
  • Discounts cannot be discounted
  • Ion Cannon, MinerBot, and reroll items can only be purchased once

Changes

  • Reduced the fire rate on blunderbusses (blunderbi?) and increased the cost
  • Run stats interface updated to group related values from perks and items
  • Movement controls tweaked to improve feel
  • Enemy rarity now included in unit spawn logic

entry.title: v0.0.7
entry.content:
• Available on Android!
  • Added first cosmic blessing encounter (Divine Knowledge)
  • Can now tap anywhere to control movement. Removed joystick
  • Added first-time tutorial popup
  • Added Tendril enemy with new attack type
  • Added Beam Ray weapon with new projectile type (piercing)

Changes

  • Item rarities rendered in item panels
  • Adjusted modifiers of legendary items
  • Factored in item rarity when populating item shop
  • Modifiers now display with styling to indicate if the effect is helpful or harmful for the player
  • Able to view equipped weapons in item screen
  • Added ability to upgrade weapons
  • If background music is enabled, subtle fade out during round end / store display, then fade back in when next round starts
  • Units are now classified by factions, which will allow for future adjustments in gameplay (mechanial damages bio, mechanical partners with AI, cosmic fights all, etc
  • Added subtle shadows to UI elements
  • Added remaining rarities for initial weapons. Balanced values a bit more
  • Adjusted rarity scaling through levels to increase chance of rarer items in latest levels
  • Corrected a sneaky bug in the perk rarity selection logic. Unfortunately for players, rarer perks are now... rarer. Will tune this pending feedback.
  • Player projectiles adjust in scale and color as damage increases
  • Removed caps on enemy damage, health, projectile speed, and movement speed because apparently getting past wave 20 isn't difficult.
  • Added movement effect to units, pickups, and background
  • Attempting to make the movement control panel a bit more obvious
  • Main menu spaceship
  • Haptics on joystick press
  • Removed the text that indicates which slot each item is held in.
  • [[Balance]] The SMG is rather useless when compared to the assault rifle. The fire rate could probably be reduced significantly on the SMG
  • [[Bug]] enemy projectiles are not despawned at the end of the level. add an event listener to the projectiles to check for the level end event, OR, parent them to a collection and then destroy the contents of that collection
  • [[GameFeel]] also, add an attack cooldown randomized interval to spiders so that they're not casting the wave of projectiles like they are in this version
  • [[Balance]] For each level / wave, it would be good to scale the spawn sizes throughout each wave. So when the wave starts, get the maximum spawn size/ from the previous round and the current round, and then using the wave duration, scale the number of units to spawn so that the last 30 seconds are spawning with the full wave capacity.
  • [[Bug]] Synthlegs movement reduced from 2000% to 400%
  • [[GameFeel]] Reduced spider movement speed
  • [[Balance]] Maybe add a stat ceiling for stats that get initialized in the UnitStats method so that units are not scaling uncontrollably in the later levels
  • Armored space mites now have a chance to consume cells, incentivizing player to pick them up
  • Added confirmation double tap to reroll buttons and sell item button
  • [[Interface]] Item modifiers displayed on the death/final screen

New Items

  • armor piercing rounds: +10% damage, -2.5% fire rate
  • Added rare item which provides +5 health
  • Bipod: +10% Attack Range, -5% movement speed
  • Ocular implants: +75 range

Bugfix

  • Try to figure out why loading between scenes is causing some fonts to be discarded
  • The confirm button is not resetting after time. Also need to reset it between rounds
  • Fixed bug where enemy armor was not taken into consideration

entry.title: v0.0.6
entry.summary: - Items now appear in the item store
entry.content:
• Items now appear in the item store
    • Some placeholder images being used
    • Stats will be adjusted and balanced in time. Initial values in place to confirm proper integration with game logic
  • Item modifiers apply to player stats and the enemy spawner
  • Text popups for damage (units, players) and pickups (cells)
  • Audio for combat, pickups, and some initial background music
  • Particle effects for damage and movement
  • Animations for biological mite units
  • New hero sprite
  • Weapons have kickback on fire
  • Mechanical arms appear to hold more weapons
  • Volume controls in pause menu

Changes

  • Three new enemy types
    • Armored mite (wave 3)
    • Cyber mite (wave 5)
    • Cyber mite with explosive projectiles (wave 8)
  • Enraged units now spawn adjusted color and slight scale increase
  • Enemies move slightly away from player on death (to create knockback visual)
  • Unit stats now scale with level after the unit has appeared for one level previously
  • Character flashes blue if damage done to armor, red if damage done to health
  • Moved the joystick a bit further down the screen and disabled enemy spawn at bottom 20% of screen

Bugfix

  • Fixed bug where the player could reroll if all four items are locked in the item shop
  • Fixed bug where player could buy additional weapons, even if all slots were full. Have not yet implemented logic for upgrading if same rarity.

entry.title: v0.0.5
entry.summary: - The pause menu now displays release notes for the current version
entry.content:
• The pause menu now displays release notes for the current version
  • initial set of items now available after each wave
  • Two additional weapons can be equipped (total of four)
  • Death screen now displays your all-time highest wave completed
  • Added spread damage and projectile functionality for shotgun-like weapons

Changes

  • Perks now display with percentages for name and value
  • Weapons rotate to face target before firing
  • Added perk descriptions
  • Less enemies with more health
  • Reduce the enemy movement speed slightly
  • Reduced space-mite size
  • Set the gun pivot point back towards the handle to make the rotation more realistic
  • Display the player cell count in the item store
  • Quite a bit behind the scenes in preparation for non-weapon items in the item store

Bugfix

  • Weapons are purchased even if player does not have enough open slots
  • Cells are not subtracted on item purchase
  • Reroll currently does nothing because there are only four items
  • Locked items not persisting between levels

entry.title: v0.0.3
entry.summary: - Ability to reroll perks, for a price
entry.content:
• Ability to reroll perks, for a price

Changes

  • Death screen now shows level and perk summary at death
  • Player briefly flashes red and changes facial expression when taking damage
  • Corpses are displayed on unit death
  • Changed perk rarity color to background (was previously perk name)

Balance

  • Fixed issue where closest enemy to player was not being targeted
  • Fixed issue where selecting the attack range perk was breaking the SMG
  • Corrected calculation for adjusted armor perk
  • Improved critical damage calculation
  • Adjusted scaling of enemy health and damage

Bugfix

entry.title: v0.0.4
entry.summary: - The game now has a name- Synapse!
entry.content:
• The game now has a name- Synapse!
  • Created an instagram and registered playsynapse.com
  • Randomly spawn health and armor pickups on the level
    • Pickups give cells if health pickup and player has max health
    • Armor pickup always adds armor
    • Pickups can spawn closer to player if less than 5 health

Changes

  • Limited number of corpses on screen to 30
  • Made everything smaller on screen
  • Adjusted hitboxes to be a bit more forgiving for the player
  • Add a pickup spawn boost perk to reduce time between pickup spawns
  • Adjusted fire rate of weapons to make the game a bit more challenging
  • Significantly adjusted the number of enemies that spawn in later waves. You should be able to make it past level 15 now.
  • Updated the application icon and loading screen
  • Units become disinterested if far enough away from player
  • Units will flee if a threshold of units are killed in their proximity
  • 15% chance to spawn enraged units with increased stats and no chance of threat
  • 50% chance of receiving cell pickup at end of level (make a stat that adjusts this)

Bugfix
